intro: Eulobus, commonly known as the common eulobus, is a genus of flowering plants in the family Apiaceae. It is characterized by its compound leaves and small, often fragrant flowers. The plants typically grow in temperate regions and are found in various habitats such as meadows and woodlands. Eulobus species are known for their medicinal properties and have been used in traditional herbal remedies. The genus includes several species, each with slight variations in morphology and distribution.
